title: Spin Our Wheels
lyrics:
I was feeling ill
From sitting still
So sick of my routine
In a bungalow
Like a typical teen

I was hoping there'd be more

Then you knocked upon my door

Wanting to go

Places I never been



What did I know?

Ready, let's go



There's only so much time

We can kill here

Before we start to

Spin our wheels

I've had time to run but

I'm still here

You can't imagine

How that feels



We talked the talk

But to walk the walk

Is easier said than done

And even though

We were ready to run



Never saw the greener grass

Never grabbed the ring of brass

Nothing to show

Flying far from the sun



That may be true

But if I've got you



There's only so much time

We can kill here

Before we start to

Spin our wheels

I've had time to run but

I'm still here

Can you imagine

How that feels?



With your support

I can hold the fort

While others leave town



Don't mind if they go

If you'll be hanging around



There's only so much time

We can kill here

And when we start to

Spin our wheels



If I ever need you

You're right here

You can't imagine

How that feels



Watch us while we

Spin our wheels
